name: Keny's Last Stand
description:
A small zombie game by HACKGUN TEAM where you play as Keny : the last survivor in the city of Kenssets.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click - Shoot / Slash
  • E - Pickup Item
  • 1-5 - Equip / Use Item

Credits:

  • 3D assets by Kenney
  • Aldo the Apache font by AJ Paglia
  • Sounds from freesound & soundsnap
